author: Simon Difford
description: Delivers as promised – its red and sour but also bittersweet. Although this aperitivo may not have broad appeal, for those whose palate is suitably tuned this will be a treat.
name: Rossa Sour
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
